name: Udder Chaos (Noniee)
description:
PLOT --

The world has infiltrated by aliens, but they only want one thing. Cows, you're the last cow on earth, and aliens are trying to get you. Dodge the alien beams and survive 60 seconds to win.

JAM --

Tri-jam | "Leave me alone"                                                                                        - Cow just wants to be left alone, but the aliens keep bugging him

CONTROLS --

A/D to move left and right

CREDITS --

Art - Kenney  www.kenney.nl
